name: TUNIQ TX-4 Extreme Performance 1 g Thermal Paste
Features: [Better performance than TX-3 thermal grease., Easier to apply than TX-3 thermal grease, 6.53W/mK Ultra-High thermal conductivity for superior heat transfer, Tends to form a thinner layer between CPU and heatsink than other greases even under low pressure, Helps the low-pressure clip design of cooler to achieve better cooling performance, RoHS compliant, Low bleed under high pressure, Not electrically conductive, High stability and reliability, Appearance: Grey, Viscosity: 66,200 CP, Thermal conductivity: 6.53 W/mK, Operating temperature: -45°C ~ 160°C, Volume: 1ml]
